attributes.action: Stand up to Human Rights, Indian Government wrongly jailing innocent Sikhs.
attributes.additional_details:
We request for the government to help the Sikhs in India & listen to the Sikhs of the UK, stop the torture in India, put pressure on the Indian Government regarding Human Rights. 

Also to have coverage on the UK media channels so the UK know what is happening in India and how corrupt Indian Government is.
attributes.background: Indian Government not releasing prisoners that already served their sentence. And now beating Sikhs up in the State of Panjab.
